Articles.Content:
The hill collapses as it is weak from several breaches of the laws of physics and the fabric of reality. I make a new hill.

My hill.

Invalid gravitational constant. The hill will be restarted.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-07T15:40:43Z" title="06/07/2018 03:40  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 7, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I make a new hill my god powers. It is made of the same material my body is made of.

my godly invincible hill.

Biohill gets ill.

A standard calcium carbonate and phosphate hill

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-07T17:07:43Z" title="06/07/2018 05:07  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 7, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

?

I turn the biohill into potassium perchlorate and ignite it.

you are blinded by the massive flash powder explosion.

your burning crater.

I Destroy the hill, leaving a crater, fill it in with Some sort of hard material with you inside, and then build a graphene (indestructible. period.) bunker on it. My hill and bunker. also build fallout shelter.

I phase through the hill and drop some nukes on it. 

Your crater with irradiated bunker.
Alas, you got sticked in the hill due to phases dissonance.
Due to a spelling error on kerbiloid’s part, that previous post never happened.
I fill in the crater. My hill.

And as kerbiloid wasn't casting a spell, that was not a spelling error, but just an illiteracy.  

So, Fraston is still sticked inside the filled crater... hill... whatever.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-07T18:54:50Z" title="06/07/2018 06:54  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 7, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
WHOOPEEEEEEEE!!!!

With my god powers, I levitate the hill( as well as the entire tectonic plate it’s attached to )up off of me and send it into <abbr title="Low Kerbin Orbit">LKO</abbr>. In the low gravity, the hill falls apart and I am free. I also increase the gravity and send a broken tectonic plate as well as the crumbled hill streaking through the atmosphere onto [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) and [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/).

Des Por Ylem

The Broken Tectonic Plate ^(tm)^ falls down into the huge pit and fills it.  

No hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-07T19:55:22Z" title="06/07/2018 07:55  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 7, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I use the pieces of the Broken Tectonic Plate (c) 2018 Patent Pending to make a new partly molten hill.

My hill.

Tech

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Fraston said:
> 
> 
> onto﻿﻿ [@﻿The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) and [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/).
> 

Technically, I was In the bunker, therefore, I am alive!!! also, you don't have god powers.

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> Technically, I was In the bunker, therefore, I am alive!!!
> 

Please, stay right where you are. Our liquidation team will arrive soon. Thank you for your co-operation.

I liquidate your liquidation team.

My hill.
I break out of my bunker and take back the hill. My hill.

I revert to launch. It takes me back to the beginning of human civilization. I manipulate the past enough to change the word hill in the english language into double bacon cheeseburger and visa versa. I go to McDonalds.

My 100% not fake hill.
Hehe. I undo your action. My hill.

> 
> 
> 18 hours ago, The Minmus Derp said:
> 
> 
> Tech
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Technically, I was In the bunker, therefore, I am alive!!! also, you don't have god powers.
> 

ahem? read some of the above posts.

I transmute your Graphene Bunker^tm^into osmium. the weight of the bunker crushes the hill.
They melt the osmium bunker and make a lot of osmium penetrators.

I take the osmium penetratirs and take the hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-08T19:42:08Z" title="06/08/2018 07:42  PM" data-short="6 yr">June 8, 2018</time> by The Minmus Derp**

***Drakarys***

Molten hill is mine.
